alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham, Sullivan, southwestern Grafton, northeastern Cheshire, Hillsborough and southern Merrimack Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Claremont to near Charlestown to near Francestown to Pelham. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Derry, Claremont, Lebanon, Henniker, New London, Merrimack, Salem, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Peterborough, Hopkinton, New Boston and Charlestown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 48, and between mile markers 57 and 60. Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
